storyInfo: After Scout beheads the mercenary leader, W's team pursues him as agreed. Though Ines considers letting her old comrade go, Scout has already made up his mind.

attributes.content: You... I’ve seen you somewhere before... comrade. We’ve met on the battlefield before.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary Leader

attributes.content: ...Hey, hey. You shouldn’t have come to Chernobog. Everybody here has the intel on Rhodes Island. You’re all going to die here.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary Leader

attributes.content: But no matter how good you are, you shouldn’t have been able to get through W’s defensive line. Not unless...
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary Leader

attributes.content: By the looks of things, she ended up making that choice after all. In fact, we all expected it.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary Leader

attributes.options: Some of you fought with us, side-by-side.;That’s the only reason we’re still exchanging words on the battlefield.

attributes.content: ...Theresa was an exceptional leader. She changed the way many people see this patch of dirt.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary Leader

attributes.content: But it was an idealized viewpoint.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary Leader

attributes.content: You don’t need to argue with me. I know better than you the cruelty that Kazdel has faced, nor do I want to deny her. But for such a tremendous effort, I just want to see some semblance of results.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary Leader

attributes.content: Only by the Regent’s hand can a new future come to Kazdel. There’s not enough goodwill to go around for everyone.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary Leader

attributes.options: We could have tried to work together. Or at least so that we don’t have to die together.

attributes.content: A naive notion. How are we supposed to set aside our years of discontent as Sarkaz? How are we to right a long history of wrongs?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary Leader

attributes.content: Ursus and the uninfected. Reunion and the Infected. Kazdel and the Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary Leader

attributes.content: It’s all the same. I became more convinced of it during the time I spent working with Reunion.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary Leader

attributes.content: His Royal Highness, the Regent, can open a new home for us, and I’ve chosen to chase this opportunity.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary Leader

attributes.content: Just as in the past, you still naively cling to Theresa.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary Leader

attributes.content: ...That’s enough.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary Leader

attributes.content: Since W decided to let you through, you must’ve also paid the price.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary Leader

attributes.content: What did you give up? An underling who died to buy you time? Or... maybe your own soul?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary Leader

attributes.content: Tell me the name you go by now.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary Leader

attributes.content: It’s been a while since I heard that name. Originally, I wanted to carve your name onto this knife as a show of respect.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary Leader

attributes.content: ...But you’re right.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary Leader

attributes.content: Stop resisting.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: ...The twelve other members of your team have been eliminated.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Leafa, Mimi, and Thumbtack died after being surrounded by Reunion casters. One died on her feet.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Mary, Macron, Slink, and Scorpion held a section that W broke with her own team.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Milim, Tipsy, and Mudflower took one of our teams down with them. One of them fought her way out of the trap, but Hoederer’s swordsmen got her head.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Unexpectedly, Pter died downstairs over there not too long ago. Apparently tried to save some civilian who didn’t have time to evacuate.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Slanna’s still breathing and we took her in, but she’s probably looking for some way to kill herself.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: ....What, nothing to say?
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Stop hiding. I know you can hear me. I can see your shadow, and I can tell from your ragged breathing that you’re badly wounded.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: ...Why do you know their names?
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: W told me specifically for the occasion. You guys keep some kind of dogtags on you.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: 'At least you have to know who you killed. This isn’t Kazdel anymore. It’d be bad if you killed the wrong person.'
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Those aren’t dogtags, and the operators we lost... weren’t all soldiers.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: I thought W would finish me herself.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: Hmph. She... Would you believe me if I told you that she doesn’t have the heart to do that?
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: You killed the leader that the Regent sent. She’s not the only one who wants to take over, so she has her hands full.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Like the agreement you had with W.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: As soon as you complete your mission, we’ll annihilate you with all our strength, in 'hindsight.'
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: ...During the firefight, you even took the time to rescue someone. But, that’s not any of our business.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Patriot is over there, so there’s no need to bother with that.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: ...Good.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: You’ve all... changed. W was not the kind of person to go out of her way to remember the names of the dead.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: Yeah, she did change. But she’s only become more of a lunatic.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Your experience on the battlefield is pure, like Faust’s Arts. Who’s to say that this wasn’t just a ruse to trip you up? What if she only wrote down their names so I could toy with you with my Arts?
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: ...That sounds like her. She would never miss an opportunity to have some fun.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: Same with you. Didn’t you also agree to this crazy deal that only W could come up with?
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Trading my life for an opportunity, then letting those who should take that opportunity follow through? There’s nothing crazy about that.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: Just like those who sacrificed their lives. They died for their own ideals. Without them, I cannot succeed.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: ...It seems like everyone’s changed with the passing of time.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: You too. You never would’ve given your enemy time to breathe, like you’re doing now.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: Hoederer should have warned you.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: What?!
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Why are you still resisting?
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: ...Tch... He’s gone...
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: But don’t think you can get away so easily...
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: (This way?)
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: (No doubt, this is the way. He’s fast.)
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: (Tricky bastard. If he wasn’t injured, I might not even be able to keep up...)
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: (Wait...)
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: (He... he’s heading towards the middle of the city?)
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: (That’s where... Tch!)
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: ...Damn it!
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: What are you after, so close to the core city?
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Why can’t you just get out of Chernobog?!
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: ...You really don’t act like a Sarkaz at times, Ines.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: I never was one.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: —You should keep pretending that you are. You are a Sarkaz mercenary, and this is the battlefield.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: You can’t even run anymore. You’ve lost too much blood, your head is spinning, and your limbs are going numb. Your shadow’s the only thing still burning. You shouldn’t even be able to stand.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: I’m well aware of my own injuries. Besides, this place is crawling with Reunion.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: But for the lot of you... You, Hoederer, and also W... I have a suggestion.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: ...For Her Majesty’s sake.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Use those eyes of yours to see the truth, and don’t die in vain before that.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: We Sarkaz... should not allow others to continue to use us.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: Are you talking about my Arts? What am I supposed to be seeing—
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: ——What... this... Who is this... why...?
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: ...Sarkaz?
attributes.name: Talulah?

attributes.content: Impossible... She saw me?!
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: (Now’s my chance—!)
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: Long time no see.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Nngh... You? So... you’re alive...
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: Mhm.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: I’ve been following you this whole time. I figured Ines alone wouldn’t be enough to handle an elite like you.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: The price to pay for this information is your life. And though we never planned to show any mercy, I did hope that you would...
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: But now, we can’t give you any more chances. You’re too close to the core city. W doesn’t want anyone poking around over there.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Heh... Sounds like... she’s the captain now...
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: You... always...
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: ...I’m sorry. Sleep now, old friend.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: You... should not stay here...
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: ...I know, old friend.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: I’ve known that all along.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Hoederer!
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: You hesitated back there. Why?
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: —Hurry!
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: We need to let W know, immediately!
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Tch! She’s coming!
attributes.name: Ines
